definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Pull off a successful 4-point play with any player, in a non-simulated game.
sentences.chinese: 非模拟模式比赛，使用任意球员完成四分打。

sentences.english: If it infringes the second, award a free kick and a yellow card.
sentences.chinese: 如果是第二种侵犯，处罚一个任意球和一个黄牌。

sentences.english: Closed Area defensive side foul, offensive side or indirect punishment completely arbitrary ball.
sentences.chinese: 禁区内防守方犯规，进攻方罚点球或间接任意球。

sentences.english: Win by at least 50 points with any team, in a non-simulated game.
sentences.chinese: 非模拟模式比赛，使用任意球队胜对手50分以上。

sentences.english: Celtic became dangerous only thanks to dangerous free kicks by Nakamura.
sentences.chinese: 凯尔特人唯一的威胁来自中村俊辅的任意球。

sentences.english: Only at corners or free-kicks can we both go.
sentences.chinese: 只有在发角球或者任意球时，我们都可以上前进攻。

sentences.english: Get a triple-double with any player.
sentences.chinese: 任意球员拿到一次三双。

sentences.english: Look at last Sunday - he won us the penalty and then the free-kick.
sentences.chinese: 看看上周吧，他为我们赢得了一个点球一个任意球。

sentences.english: We have a handful of players who can take free-kicks but he's definitely staked a claim to take the next one.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多能踢任意球的人，但他主动要求主罚。

sentences.english: Four minutes later he curled a fierce free-kick towards the top corner.
sentences.chinese: 四分钟后他的大力任意球直奔球门上角。

sentences.english: The Spanish starlet curled home a superb free-kick after 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 比赛开始10分钟，西班牙小将任意球弧线钻进网窝。

sentences.english: Ina competition, Chilavert usually kick foul shots and free kicks.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛中，奇拉维特经常主罚点球和任意球。

sentences.english: One lateral free kick was enough for them to take the three points.
sentences.chinese: 一个侧翼的任意球战术破门，让陕西队带着三分回家。

sentences.english: "He can punish teams from a dead-ball situation, " warned Fletcher.
sentences.chinese: 他能够通过任意球给予你致命一击。

sentences.english: It's an indirect free-kick from where he dived on the ball.
sentences.chinese: 在他手球的地点判给对方一个间接任意球。

sentences.english: Award an indirect free-kick. Thanks to Jason Mennard.
sentences.chinese: 所以，判给进攻方一个间接任意球。

definition: corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
(sports) to extend the duration of a game (due to stoppages)/(abbr. for 傷停補時|伤停补时[shang1 ting2 bu3 shi2]) injury time
